data.title: VERŌNIKA BERLIN
data.text:
Bar Verōnika mimics the essence of Restaurant Verōnika, with a more casual approach. Tuck into a deep lush sofa, sit back and enjoy the intimate escape. Right above the restaurant, the Bar offers you a treat with a curated selection of cocktails, wines from the old and new world and local beers. We also serve our Verōnika NYC favorite: The Martini Tray, with or without alcohol. Chefs display their best small intimate plates which is a good foundation for a night out at the museum. Drinks are welcome to be enjoyed throughout the museum!

Fotografiska Berlin is The Contemporary Museum for Photography, Art and Culture, founded in Stockholm. It is dedicated to presenting inspiring and innovative visual artworks. The museum promotes talented artists from diverse backgrounds, both locally and internationally, and creates a diverse and inclusive artistic community.

Fotografiska Berlin's program includes curated exhibitions, events, concerts, workshops and lectures. Visitors can also find a Bakery, Café Bar, Restaurant & Rooftop Bar across six floors. The museum is open until 11 p.m. every day, allowing guests to enjoy all facilities in a flexible way.

The Museum covers an area of 5,500 square meters on Oranienburger Straße. Fotografiska Berlin is the fourth museum opening of the Fotografiska Group with locations in Stockholm, Tallinn, New York and Shanghai. The museum contributes to the global art community by showcasing outstanding artistic talent and appreciating the historical context, providing an enriching experience for all visitors.
